signin.title: Sign In
signin.make_account.txt: Don't have an account? Create one!
signup.title: Create New Account
signup.choice.title: Select Provider
signup.choice.txt: Select provider for your new account. If you are unsure about your provider, contact your administrator for more details.
signup.step.custom_provider.txt: Enter custom signup service URL that will create a 3NWeb account.
signup.step.custom_provider.err.no_conne: Fail to connect. Is url correct?
signup.step.custom_provider.err.non_ok_s: Server replies funny ({status}). Is url correct?
signup.step.custom_provider.err.general: Error occured. Is url correct? Is device online?
signup.step.create_user.txt: Username should be between 6 and 60 characters. You can use letters, numbers, and any characters except the @ symbol. You can use characters from any language.
signup.step.create_password.txt: Your login password must be at least 12 characters. You can use letters, numbers and any characters. You can use characters from any language.
signup.step.acknowledgments.txt.intro: Please read and acknowledge if you agree with following:
signup.step.acknowledgments.txt.check1.p: You control your password for your own safety.
signup.step.acknowledgments.txt.check2.p: I agree to remember the password or make a
Write on paper, or another non-digital form.
signup.step.acknowledgments.txt.check3.p: I will make a copy of my password and store it securely with my
Trustee may be close family, friends, lawyers, etc.
signup.step.progress.txt: Please wait a few moments while your account keys are generated, and server creates an account for you. Do not close this window.
err.domain_not_found: Domain {domain} is not found. Is it entered correctly?
err.domain_has_no_srv: Domain {domain} has no service. Is it entered correctly?
err.login_not_recognized: Login {login} is not recognized. Is it entered correctly?
